House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00075
FULL TITLE : AN ACT STRENGHTENING THE RIGHT OF CITIZENS TO INFORMATION HELD BY THE GOVERNMENT
SHORT TITLE : People’s Freedom Of Information Act
ABSTRACT : Establishes the procedure for the access of information and provides remedies to the requesting party in case of denial to provide the needed information and imposes administrative sanctions or criminal liability against any public officer or employee who violates the provisions of the act.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VARGAS, ALFRED D.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
